PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-02442010-03-10DFAIT,  ,  ,  , 
SubjectConvention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities *** RATIFICATION***
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to bring into force for Canada the CONVENTION ON THE RIGHTS OF PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES in order to underscore Canada's long-standing commitment to equality, inclusion and full participation in Canadian society for persons with disabilities.
AttachmentsAttachment
